TopicTitle: Harmony, my ISS clone with realistic solar array!

Articles.Content:
So Damned Robotics came out recently, and the amount of things it lets you do are amazing. I know many people have made ISS clones, but I believe this is the first with a realistic solar array.

Pre-Deployment:

I\'m not showing my launch vehicle, because I had to cheat to get this thing in orbit without shaking apart...

Everything Deployed and Ready to Rotate:

And Then, it Moves!

Now is the hard part. For those of you interested in looking at this and attempting to launch it yourself, you\'ll need:

Damned Robotics

Floodlights (Which requires Carts)

MultiJointParts

And Nova\'s BACE, Probodobodyne, and SE 1.2

Click here to grab the .craft file!

Looks really beautiful!

Especially the Floodlights were a good idea. I have to copy that ;P
Thanks! I saw people using the floodlights for Mun bases, and realized it\'d help a lot with orbital rendezvous on the dark side of Kerbin.

Hey, I have all the mods listed, but when I go to open it says probekitantenna.Comms is missing. I see I have the probekitantenna part, but nothing about comms. Are you sure everything is listed/no other changes?
It could be the one from the Sattelite Relay Plugin, you can change it to the normal one in the .craft file, should work.
That\'s exactly what it is. I\'m sorry, I completely spaced that I have my stations relay through my comms network.
plz help i cant open ksp forum links and why dont you make a download with thos mods in it because now i cant use this one

Hi Project97, this is a very old thread, and it is most likely not going to be updated any further, plus all the old links were broken in the move to vBulletin.

As well as that, it is bad form to revive such old threads without adding significantly to the discussion, so this thread will now be closed, please take care when posting, and check the date of the last post in future
